ConfigWindow_ActionItem_Description: 在本面板中，您可以修改每个动作的使用条件。
ConfigWindow_HelpItem_Description: In this panel, you can see all commands for combat that can use in for XIV Auto Attack
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackSmart: Start Attacking in auto-target mode when not in combat. Switch the targeting condition in combat.
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackCancel: Stop Attacking, please always do it!
Configwindow_HelpItem_HealArea: Open one window period to use one or serveral range healing actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_HealSingle: Open one window period to use one or serveral single healing actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_DefenseArea: Open one window period to use one or serveral range defense actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_DefenseSingle: Open one window period to use one or serveral single defense actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_EsunaShield: Open one window period to use Esuna,tank stance skills or True North.
Configwindow_HelpItem_RaiseShirk: Open one window period to use Raise or Shirk.
Configwindow_HelpItem_AntiRepulsion: Open one window period to use knockback-penalty skill.
Configwindow_HelpItem_BreakProvoke: Open one window period to use break-combo or provoke skill.
Configwindow_HelpItem_Move: Open one window period to use move skill.
Configwindow_Helper_EditCombo: Click to edit this custom Combo.
Configwindow_AttackItem_Description: 你可以选择开启想要的职业的连续GCD战技、技能，若职业与当前职业相同则有命令宏提示。
Configwindow_AttackItem_LoadScript: 点击以载入自定义循环
Configwindow_AttackItem_ScriptFolderErro: 请设定一个路径以正常使用自定义循环！
Configwindow_Events_Description: 在这个窗口，您可以设置一些技能释放后使用什么宏。
